meanings.definition: A device used to block or obstruct something.
meanings.sent1: He used wooden stops to keep the door from closing.
meanings.sent2: The traffic cone serves as a stop for the cars.
meanings.sent3: The door stop prevented the door from slamming shut.
meanings.sent4: The dam acted as a stop for the flowing water.
meanings.sent5: The stop sign alerts drivers to come to a halt.

meanings.definition: A place where a vehicle or person halts temporarily.
meanings.sent1: The bus made a quick stop to pick up passengers.
meanings.sent2: She waited at the bus stop for her friend.
meanings.sent3: The train stop was bustling with commuters.
meanings.sent4: The pit stop during the race was lightning fast.
meanings.sent5: The rest stop had a beautiful view of the mountains.

meanings.sent2: Each stop on the organ produces a different tone.
